text: Richard Chiassaro (born 11 November 1981) is a British Paralympic athlete who competes mainly in category T54 sprint events and middle distance events. ==Early life== Chiassaro was born in England in 1981. Chiassaro was born with spina bifida. ==References== Category:British male sprinters Category:British male wheelchair racers Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:People with spina bifida
title: Richard Chiassaro
